segments.text: The girl is so cute, standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how innocent she seems, not worried at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice how dangerous the situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes her brother could fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just focused on that cookie, nothing else matters to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she gets what she wants, but I’m worried for her too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s sweet how much she trusts him, even though he’s being reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could give her a cookie myself so she doesn’t have to wait.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s the only one who seems happy in this whole mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
